subject: my ideal ripeness
body:
1\. the banana i had in my cereal this morning, which was at ~3.5 on [the ripeness scale](https://www.researchgate.net/figure/Banana-ripening-scale-Don-Edwards-UC-Davis-Postharvest-California-USA-Color-figure_fig1_352362709), my ideal ripeness.

2\. as previously reported a large part of our household conversation is deborah and i ventriloquizing miso, usually to express the many complaints that she has about us, and i'm thankful that deborah recently came up with her addressing us collectively as "jebbie" (justin + debbie) and now we say it all the time and it's always good for a laugh

3\. really needing a laugh after work, getting very stoned (i'm thankful to try to make a practice of noting weed strains i like as i try them so i remember: my favorite lately is called "[pure michigan](https://www.leafly.com/strains/pure-michigan)" which is a very loose and silly indica), watching [a "try not to laugh" vine compilation](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=vine+try+not+to+laugh) (i'm thankful there are so many), and laughing heartily several times.

2\. as previously reported a large part of our household conversation is deborah and i ventriloquizing miso, usually to express the many complaints that she has about us, and i'm thankful that deborah recently came up with her addressing us collectively as "jebbie" (justin + debbie) and now we say it all the time and it's always good for a laugh

3\. really needing a laugh after work, getting very stoned (i'm thankful to try to make a practice of noting weed strains i like as i try them so i remember: my favorite lately is called "[pure michigan](https://www.leafly.com/strains/pure-michigan)" which is a very loose and silly indica), watching [a "try not to laugh" vine compilation](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=vine+try+not+to+laugh) (i'm thankful there are so many), and laughing heartily several times.
